name: Pop Music to Country Music-Crossover Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which group went from being a Disco act to having such Country hit songs as 'Woke Up In Love' and 'Give Me One More Chance' ?
questions.explanation:
Exile.

	Exile had the chart topping Disco song 'Kiss You All Over'.

questions.text: Which artist started his career with the Rock song 'It's Only Make Believe' before turning Country with such songs as 'That's My Job' and 'Hello Darlin' '?
questions.explanation:
Conway Twitty.

	It's amazing to think that when Conway Twitty started his music was considered Rock and Roll. 'It's Only Make Believe' was not even a Top 40 Country hit.

questions.text: Which artist had a Top 40 Pop Hit with the song 'Modern Day Delilah' before joining the Country group Blackhawk?
questions.explanation:
Van Stephenson.

	Van Stephenson also co-wrote numerous songs recorded by the group Restless Heart.

questions.text: Which artist had a Top 40 Hit with the song 'Wildfire' before adding his middle name and doing such Country songs as 'Talking to the Wrong Man' and 'What's Forever For'?
questions.explanation:
Michael Murphy.

	He added his middle name Martin when he became Country.

questions.text: Which group started out with the song 'Mr Bojangles' before hitting it Country with such songs as 'Fishin' in the Dark' and 'Modern Day Romance'?

England Dan and John Ford Coley had the hit 'I'd Really Love to See You Tonight' before England Dan left and had such Top 40 Country hits such as 'Bop' and 'One Friend'. What is England Dan's last name?
Which artist had a Top 40 Pop hit with the song 'Down in the Boondocks' before becoming Country and having the hit '"I'll Pin a Note On Your Pillow"'?
Which Country group did Chris Hillman found years after he was a member of the Rock group The Byrds?
questions.explanation:
The Desert Rose Band.

	The Desert Rose Band had such hits as 'Summer Wind' and 'One Step Forward'.

questions.text: Which artist had a Top 40 Pop Hit with 'Ashes by Now' before becoming Country with such songs as 'She's Crazy for Leaving' and 'It's Such a Small World' which was recorded with his wife Roseanne Cash?
questions.explanation:
Rodney Crowell.

	Rodney Crowell also wrote Bob Seger's chart topper 'Shame on the Moon' and currently the song 'Ashes by Now' is climbing the Country charts by Lee Ann Womack (October 2000).

questions.text: Which artist had a Top 40 hit with the song 'I Go Crazy' before recording the Country song 'I Won't Take Less Then Your Love' with Tanya Tucker and Paul Overstreet?
